name: Zmey Headling
description: The Zmey Headling is a medium-sized dragon with a strong physical presence and natural armor. It has a fearsome bite and sharp claws, with scales that hint at its fiery breath.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate and devastating fire breath make it a terrifying opponent.
goals: To dominate its territory and engage in combats to prove its might.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other chaotic creatures, could have elemental creatures as allies.
environment: Typically found in diverse terrains capable of supporting both water and land.
strengths: Possesses resistances to cold and fire damage along with regenerative capabilities.
weaknesses: Poor mental statistics, specifically low Intelligence and Charisma.
attacks: Can unleash a powerful bite and claw attacks, as well as a fire breath attack in a cone.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which can cause massive damage in a wide area while being selective in its targets.
additional_information: Regenerates 10 hit points at the beginning of each turn.
Can breathe both air and water, enhancing adaptability.
Can choose not to harm plants with its fire breath.
Has natural armor providing good protection.
Forms a moderate challenge for adventurers.
test_queries: dragon with bite and claw attacks
